textContent:
That we are true to ourselves always, for when we aren't it opens us up for resentment, anger and disconnection 

When we are true to ourselves, we will disappoint each other, and that is okay. We allow ourselves to feel our feelings and we take responsibility for our own feelings and actions 

We need to be seen in the places where we have been hurt. We need to feel that our feelings are okay. We need to know those feelings can be held and not taken personally.
title: Commitments
textContentHtml:
That we are true to ourselves always, for when we aren't it opens us up for resentment, anger and disconnection 


When we are true to ourselves, we will disappoint each other, and that is okay. We allow ourselves to feel our feelings and we take responsibility for our own feelings and actions 


We need to be seen in the places where we have been hurt. We need to feel that our feelings are okay. We need to know those feelings can be held and not taken personally.
